price: 13. Tohuk lakal kay samad labhâ xiiroonuk yawqe daacoytak abne daccarsime aracal kaa hayne (say marih maxax kinnuk).
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
